item.title: New Book: Aspect-Oriented Programming in PHP
item.description: I’ve been looking for a way to challenge myself as well as showcase some of my knowledge to the world. After some thinking, I’ve decided that I would go ahead and write a book. I’ve been reading a lot about aspect-oriented programming and really like what it provides to enhance object-oriented programming. There isn’t a lot of information about this in the PHP community so I figured a book would be a great way to drum up some more interest and help create a larger community around the subject of AOP.
